name: web-tools
description: A collection of single-page web tools deployable as Cloudflare Pages

scripts.dev:exif: cd pages/exif-remover && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.dev:flowdown: cd pages/flowdown-config && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.dev:hdr: cd pages/hdr-tool && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.dev:daoli: cd pages/daoli-tool && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.dev:emoji: cd pages/emoji-splitter && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.dev:solar: cd pages/solar && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.dev:pyramid: cd pages/pyramid-filter && wrangler pages dev public
scripts.deploy:exif: cd pages/exif-remover && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:flowdown: cd pages/flowdown-config && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:hdr: cd pages/hdr-tool && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:daoli: cd pages/daoli-tool && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:emoji: cd pages/emoji-splitter && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:solar: cd pages/solar && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:pyramid: cd pages/pyramid-filter && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm run deploy:exif && pnpm run deploy:flowdown && pnpm run deploy:hdr && pnpm run deploy:daoli && pnpm run deploy:emoji && pnpm run deploy:solar && pnpm run deploy:pyramid && pnpm run deploy:wireframe
